#id=1
#text=As I was getting ready for bed last night , I took a bath .
#id=2
#text=I took off my clothes , then turned on the water in the tub .
#id=3
#text=I made sure it was n't hot enough to hurt me , and warm enough to be comfortable .
#id=4
#text=Once I had it set , I plugged up the drain and let the tub fill up with water .
#id=5
#text=I saw there was enough water , so I turned it off and got in the tub .
#id=6
#text=I took the bottle of shampoo and put some in my hair .
#id=7
#text=As I scrubbed my hair , there were lots of suds .
#id=8
#text=I rinsed my hair real well , then took the bar of soap and started washing my body .
#id=9
#text=I made sure to get the soap all over me , then rinsed it off afterwards .
#text=I got out of the tub and pulled the plug , watching all the soapy water go down the drain .
#text=I grabbed the towel I had set out earlier , and dried myself off .
#text=I put on my night clothes and hopped in bed for the night .
